title: Looking for Taric/Lulu main for funneling strat
body:
I am very over this low diamond elo and want to skip right past it. My mental with hardstuck d4's has lost all patience. 
I am a Master Yi Main. Flame me. I am looking for a Taric/Lulu main, to help climb with each other past the goldfish iq elo as we all know as d4.
I am experienced in the funneling strategy so looking for someone experienced or already knows how it works, just hasn't put it in practice.
Hit me up on league and see how we go.

IGN: Cant Be Slowed
